title.rendered: Kentucky Sports Betting Promos – Claim $700 in Bonus Bets

content.rendered:
As Kentucky sports betting is preparing to launch on September 28, online sportsbooks are getting their Kentucky sports betting promos ready.

Customers in the Bluegrass State can now start claiming Kentucky sportsbook promos, allowing them to receive bonus funds that will be available for use when sports betting promos goes live on September 28.

Here’s a closer look at some available Kentucky betting promos, and others we expect to see in the near future.

Kentucky Sportsbook Promos

What are Kentucky Sports Betting Promos?

Kentucky has one of the larger sports betting markets in the US, which means bettors can find an endless array of sports betting promos. Kentucky betting apps have to compete heavily for users, and the best way to do this is by offering enticing bonuses and other promotions that keep the bettors coming back.

Kentucky sports betting promos range greatly, depending on the sports betting platform. This guide breaks down some of the more important options available as well as how to use KY sportsbook promo codes.

How to Claim Kentucky Sports Betting Promos

The Process for claiming Kentucky betting promos before sports betting goes live is quite simple. Select the offer you wish to claim, complete the registration process, and wait until September 28 to access your bonus bets. That’s it! No deposit is required for prelaunch offers.

  • ➡️ Claim DraftKings KY Promo – $200 in bonus bets (no deposit)
  • ➡️ Claim FanDuel KY Promo – $100 in bonus bets + $100 Off NFL Sunday Ticket (no-deposit)
  • ➡️ Claim BetMGM KY Promo – $100 in bonus bets (no-deposit)

When it comes to claiming Kentucky sports betting promos after launch, the process is usually straightforward. First, you’ll need to sign up for an account with a reputable online sportsbook that operates in the state:

  1. Click the link to the sportsbook of your choice on this page
  2. Enter your sign-up information – name, date of birth, social security number, etc.
  3. Create your username and password
  4. Download the app (if applicable)
  5. Claim your bonus

 

Once you’ve created your account, navigate to the promotions section of the website or mobile app. In some instances, it may be necessary to include one of the available Kentucky sports betting promo codes when registering with the sportsbook.

Existing sportsbook promos will mirror what users can expect to see in the Bluegrass State.

Redeem Your Kentucky Sports Betting Promos

Most Kentucky betting sites have dedicated sections on their websites or apps where they list their current and best Kentucky sportsbook promos. This makes it easy for you to find and explore the different offers available. Some may require you to enter a promo code during registration or when making a deposit, so keep an eye out for any specific instructions.

BetMGM Kentucky Bonus Offer (Projected) – $1,500 First Bet Offer

One of the top Kentucky betting promos available is from BetMGM. The $1,500 First Bet Offer provides an exciting opportunity for bettors in Kentucky to embark on their betting journey with added enthusiasm and potential winnings. Use BetMGM bonus code WAWMETAGET

To take advantage of this offer, new users need to sign up and make their first deposit on the BetMGM platform. Once the deposit is made, they can place their first bet, and if it loses, BetMGM will refund the amount up to $1,500 in bonus.

➡️ Claim BetMGM KY Prelaunch Offer

This means that even if the initial bet doesn’t go as planned, bettors get a second chance with bonus funds to explore a vast array of sports markets and betting options.

The $1,500 First Bet Offer not only enhances the betting experience but also provides a safety net for new users, making BetMGM an attractive choice for sports enthusiasts looking to wager on their favorite teams and games.

Caesars Kentucky Welcome Offer (Projected) – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets

Caesars Kentucky offers an impressive and enticing welcome offer to its new customers, giving them the chance to earn up to $250 in bonus bets as one of the top Kentucky betting promos. This promotional deal serves as a fantastic way for bettors in Kentucky to kick-start their betting journey with a substantial boost to their bankroll.

Users become eligible for this generous bonus upon signing up and making their initial deposit with Caesars promo code WAWMETAGET. Caesars Sportsbook will grant you $250 in bonus bets when you place your first bet of $50.

With its impressive welcome offer and wide range of betting options available, Caesars is definitely worth considering for Kentucky sports bettors looking for great promotions and exciting gaming opportunities.

As with any promotional offer, terms and conditions apply, and users are encouraged to read and understand the requirements to fully enjoy the benefits of the Caesars Kentucky Welcome Offer.

FanDuel Kentucky Welcome Promo Offer (Projected) – Bet $5, Get $200 In Bonus Bets + $100 Off NFL Sunday Ticket

Kentucky sports fans and prospective bettors are thrilled about the September 28th launch of FanDuel Sportsbook in the state. FanDuel is one of the most well-respected sportsbooks in the country, and its prelaunch promotion has generated a lot of excitement in the Bluegrass state.

The limited-time FanDuel Kentucky bonus code offers new users a $100 bonus bet and a $100 discount on NFL Sunday Ticket. You can claim  FanDuel promo code now and get $100 in bonus bets when sports betting goes live on September 28.

➡️ Claim FanDuel KY Prelaunch Offer

To access the welcome bonus following the platform’s release, fresh users only need to make a qualifying bet of a minimum of $5 on a suitable sporting event. After the bet is resolved, they will be granted $200 in bonus wagers, allowing them to explore numerous sports markets and potentially increase their earnings.
These bonus wagers can be employed on any sport or market of your preference within a seven-day period from when they are received. Regardless of whether you’re a devotee of football, basketball, baseball, or any other sport, there are ample chances to make the most of these bonus wagers.

The “Bet $5, Receive $200 in Bonus Bets” offer not only grants users the chance to explore the platform and its wide range of betting choices but also enhances their betting experience with FanDuel, making it more valuable and thrilling.

DraftKings Kentucky Welcome Promo (Projected)- Bet $5, Get $200

DraftKings is a renowned online sports betting and daily fantasy sports platform that attracts users with its enticing Kentucky sports betting promo of up to $200 in bonus bets when you sign up and place your first $5 bet on the app.

DraftKings is running a limited-time prelaunch special for new customers, which includes $200 in bonus bets with no deposit needed. Get a DraftKings promo code and register before September 28 to take advantage.

➡️ Claim DraftKings Prelaunch Offer

After launch, upon signing up and making their first deposit, users can receive an instant bonus after placing their first real money wager of $5 or more. This not only increases the potential winnings for bettors but also allows them to explore various betting options by using bonus bets.

As with any promotional offer, certain terms and conditions apply, and users are advised to review the requirements and guidelines before claiming the bonus.

Overall, the DraftKings bonus bets offer adds an extra incentive for sports enthusiasts to join the platform and engage in thrilling betting activities while enjoying the potential benefits of this generous promotion.

Jumpstart your bankroll with the Sports Betting Offers in Kentucky

The new Kentucky sports betting promos can greatly enhance your betting experience and increase your winnings.

  • Sign-up bonuses: The popular sportsbooks are offering sign-up bonuses to new customers. These bonuses can be in the form of free bets, deposit matches, or other rewards.
  • Risk-free bets: Risk-free bets are a type of promotion that allows you to place a bet without any risk of losing money. If your bet loses, the sportsbook will refund your stake.
  • Profit Boosts: Offer higher than usual odds on selected events. This means that you can win more money if your bet is successful.
  • Cashback rewards: Cashback rewards are a type of promotion that gives you a percentage of your losses back in the form of bonus money.
  • VIP programs: Many sportsbooks offer VIP programs for their most loyal customers. These programs offer exclusive benefits, such as enhanced odds, higher limits, and personal customer service.

When choosing a Kentucky sportsbook, comparing the different promotions offered is important. Some factors to consider include the size of the bonus, the terms and conditions, and the sportsbook’s reputation. It is also important to remember to gamble responsibly and only bet what you can afford to lose.

Sports To Bet On With Kentucky Betting Promos

When it comes to Kentucky online gambling & betting there are plenty of exciting options to choose from. You can make your wagers even more enticing with the added bonus of promotions and offers. Whether you’re a fan of the NFL, MLB,  the NBA, college basketball, or horse racing there’s something for you

College Basketball Betting in Kentucky

College Basketball season is the most exciting time for fans in the Bluegrass State. NCAA basketball betting is taken to the next level.
Kentucky sportsbooks offer a variety of betting options for college basketball enthusiasts, including moneyline bets, point spreads, and over/under totals. With top-tier teams like the Kentucky Wildcats, Louisville Cardinals, and Western Kentucky Hilltoppers, there are plenty of opportunities to make winning picks.

Stay Current with Kentucky Sportsbook Promos

It’s worth keeping an eye on the promotions page of our preferred Kentucky sportsbooks so that you don’t miss out on any exciting offers. Remember to always read the terms and conditions, including the requirement for any Kentucky betting promo codes, associated with each promo to ensure you meet all requirements and maximize your rewards.

 

Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER (CO, DC, IL, IN, LA, MD, MS, NJ, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, WY) Call 877-8-HOPENY or text HOPENY (467369) (NY). 21+ to wager. Please Gamble Responsibly. Call 1-800-NEXT-STEP (AZ), 1-800-522-4700 (KS, NV), 1-800-327-5050 (MA), 1-800-BETS-OFF (IA), 1-800-270-7117 for confidential help (MI).
